name: Robot Zombies
description:
ROBOT ZOMBIES

This is the first game I've made myself. Took me 3 weeks to complete the game.

Your are the only robot  left. A virus out break turned all robots into zombies. Fight through them to reach the end. At the end you must fight the Boss zombie robot to survive.

CONTROLS:

  • Use AD or Left/Right arrow keys to Move
  • Use Space to Jump
  • Use Left Ctrl or Left Mouse button to Shoot

TOOLS USED:

  • Unity game engine
  • Adobe photoshop

Goto my Github page to download the project link - Github Project

Goto the Builds folder to download the PC version of the game.

Thanks to Gameplusjames tutorials -GamesPlusJames Tutorial
